Saw the final of SHERLOCK S3, "His Last Vow". I was a fool being surprised in the former episodes. This is the power of last episode! (cont)
Surprisingly, the one who understands exists outside instead of inside.
"It's mistake using sun as gamer stays inside"(Boktai), "It's useless having survival feature in stealth game"(MGS3). All came from my team.
"It's improbable for game to run away from enemy"(Metal Gear),"It's out of question to make adv game with shooting sequence"(Snatcher)(cont)
It happens when we start new project. I shall watch for that.
This is something I don't wanna believe but negative force could often come from long relationship fellows rather than outsiders.(cont)
Thus even staff won't know what it is. No idea how it will be received by audience. In the end, you gotta believe in yourself.
No one has seen "new thing", for this reason it is new. Creating new thing is difficult. New thing exists only in the head of creator.(cont)

We have to head off while the end of story is already fixed. This is the hardest part, but not depicting villain, hero fallen into demon.
For fans who really love the heroic Snakes, I must make them accept the Snakes fallen into the demon in TPP. (cont)
Players who've played few MGS, aged with the Snakes and share the memories & emotions. That's the strong point of long-lived series.
But I must say MGS users are special. They have vicarious experiences of Snake's suffering journey for 27 real years. (cont)
I used such metaphor like Gillian in Snatcher had an amnesia, so as in Policenauts.
In such case Player should be able to play the game without any info about PW or GZ incidents.(cont)
For Players who havn't played series, TPP provides you the setting where protagonist has just been waken from 9 yrs of comma.(cont)
I intentionally design the memory of Player & protagonist will cross over thru the game.
the reason you swear vengeance in TPP after your MB built in PW was destroyed in GZ.(cont)
To bring Player to the same level of emotion with protagonist, MGS always fuss over that part. It's the reason Raiden appeared in MGS2(cont)
(cont) the more complex past or specific setting protagonist has. Such as Snake a hero from past wars. How can we cover the gap b/w them?
If you state in gaming, FPS applies to that method. Unlike movies, you can maneuver yourself in games. Thus the more distance it gets (cont)
Instead of detective/trained spy, an ordinary person like an audience gets involved in big incident. For this reason audience feels empathy.
in order to have closer distance b/w audience and protagonist to feel empathy with. Instead of detective or trained spy, (cont)
Hitchcock had implemented the way of "being involved" drama in latter period of his work in UK and suspence he made in US in order to (cont)

expected, or moves differently every time. I seclude myself in the studio editing, esp 2000E3(MGS2) and 2004E3(MGS3) were the hardest ones.
But the toughest part of editing trailer is gameplay scene. Esp battle scene rather than sneaking is hard to shoot. AI doesn't move as(cont)
at every release. So I was making trailer for E3 in May, Gamescome in Aug, and TGS in Sept while working on the game development.
It was important to show trailer at every show event when internet wasn't so spread back then.Load of people gather to see the trailer(cont)
As being a producer in case of "Anubis" "Castlevania""Rising", it was easier for me to edit since all elements were completed at that time.
The trailer included in PC Engine version of Snatcher pilot disc was not created by trailer editing but by programming.
I've been making trailers since Policenauts. Editing process hasn't changed thou machine's improved. Wonder which trailer you like the most.
Again, No explosion, collapse, crash, or hanging in my next trailer this time.
